column1: Art Institute of Chicago////I was motivated to write this review because I honestly feel that it is becoming prohibitively expensive to visit the Art Institute. As someone who has enjoyed this museum for many years
column2: I am dismayed to see the fees spiking. Annual membership has increased in the last few years to $90. The normal non-member admission is now over $15/person-- a small break for seniors and students. I found this para from an earlier review in 2006:
